'''...And Her Name Is the Mary Celeste''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to suffer the destruction of their [[Waverider]].

==Notes==
*This achievement will not unlock if the Waverider is destroyed by a whirlpool.

==Trivia==
* The name of this achievement is a reference to the real life ''{{w|Mary Celeste}}'', a merchant ship that was found abandoned near the Azores Islands in 1872.
* The name of this achievement might also be a reference to the {{w|Unexpected John Cena}} meme, seeing as to how the title starts with "And Her Name Is."
